content.question: Which of the following best explains the reason for the deployment of United States troops overseas at the time when this act was passed?

choices.label: The concern over German aggression in Europe
The desire to gain political control over new colonial territories
The attempts to overthrow Soviet domination in Eastern Europe
The fear of the expansion of communism to foreign nations

content.answer: The fear of the expansion of communism to foreign nations

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
